ygData.subject: Plane of Sky
ygData.msgSnippet: We cleared Pegasus Island yesterday, somehow getting the Keeper of Sky to spawn twice.  Casualties were approximately 8 to 10 of our 30 person force per
ygData.messageBody:
We cleared Pegasus Island yesterday, somehow getting the Keeper of Sky to
spawn twice. Casualties were approximately 8 to 10 of our 30 person
force per Pegasus/Griffon, and about 6 per Keeper of Sky. Today we'll get
the KoS to spawn one more time, get 36 people keys, and combat drop into
Spiroc Island. Hopefully we'll have that and Bzzzat island cleared today.

I'm looking forward to completing some of the higher tier quests in pos.
Maybe the bard and cleric items won't be as crappy as the ranger ones.

--
Miriana
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
